parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. You can obtain the application ID from the response to the [CreateAppInfo](~~CreateAppInfo~~) or [ListAppInfo](~~ListAppInfo~~) operation.

parameters.name: StorageLocation
parameters.description: The address of an Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket. This parameter does not take effect. You can call this operation to add only VOD buckets.

parameters.name: StorageType
parameters.description: The storage type. Default value: vod_oss_bucket.
